item.title: Markdown Converter
item.description: Markdown Converter is a simple Google Docs add-on. It converts the Markdown syntax in selected content into Google Docs styles. Usage Once installed, Markdown Converter creates a menu item at Add-ons > Markdown Converter. Select Add-ons > Markdown Converter > Start to start the add-on sidebar. You will see there is only one “Convert” button in the sidebar. Select any text that contains markdown syntax, then click the Convert button. Your selected text will be parsed and markdown syntax will be converted to native Google Docs styles.
